languages.text: "Варп обманывал тебя, играя твоими чувствами. Я могу понять тебя, но это не оправдание для того, что ты делала".

traits.locale_text: "Варп обманывал тебя, играя твоими чувствами. Я могу понять тебя, но это не оправдание для того, что ты делала".

languages.text: "The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."
languages.original_text: "Варп обманывал тебя, играя твоими чувствами. Я могу понять тебя, но это не оправдание для того, что ты делала".

traits.locale_text: "The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."
"The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."
"The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."
"The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."

languages.text: “亚空间欺骗了你，利用了你的感情。我能理解这种事情，但这并不能作为你做这些事情的借口。”
languages.original_text: "The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."

traits.locale_text: “亚空间欺骗了你，利用了你的感情。我能理解这种事情，但这并不能作为你做这些事情的借口。”

languages.text: «La disformidad la ha engañado. Ha jugado con sus sentimientos. Entiendo el motivo, pero eso no excusa sus actos».
languages.original_text: "The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."

traits.locale_text: «La disformidad la ha engañado. Ha jugado con sus sentimientos. Entiendo el motivo, pero eso no excusa sus actos».

languages.text: 「歪みに騙されたんだ。お前の感情を使用したのだろう。理由は理解できるが、したことの言い訳にはならない」
languages.original_text: "The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."

traits.locale_text: 「歪みに騙されたんだ。お前の感情を使用したのだろう。理由は理解できるが、したことの言い訳にはならない」

languages.text: "Der Warp hat Euch überlistet. Er hat mit Euren Gefühlen gespielt. Ich verstehe Euch, aber was Ihr getan habt, ist unentschuldbar."
languages.original_text: "The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."

traits.locale_text: "Der Warp hat Euch überlistet. Er hat mit Euren Gefühlen gespielt. Ich verstehe Euch, aber was Ihr getan habt, ist unentschuldbar."

languages.text: « Le Warp vous a trompée en jouant avec vos sentiments. Je comprends votre réaction, mais ça n'excuse en rien vos actes. »
languages.original_text: "The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."

traits.locale_text: « Le Warp vous a trompée en jouant avec vos sentiments. Je comprends votre réaction, mais ça n'excuse en rien vos actes. »

languages.text: "Öteboyut seni kandırmış. Duygularınla oynamış. Neden yaptığını anlayabiliyorum ama bunu bir mazeret olarak göremem."
languages.original_text: "The warp tricked you. It played upon your feelings. I can understand why, but that is no excuse for what you did."

traits.locale_text: "Öteboyut seni kandırmış. Duygularınla oynamış. Neden yaptığını anlayabiliyorum ama bunu bir mazeret olarak göremem."
